attributes.action: Sack every MP that has stood in the way of BREXIT! BREXIT Now!
attributes.additional_details: Civil unrest is on it's way. Any fool can see that this Government is out to destroy what the British people voted for! Dirty politics it's a mockery of our Democracy. Sack the rebels of BREXIT now!
attributes.background:
We the British people voted to leave the EU. The Government has done nothing more than to put up hurdles to fight our exit from the EU.

Sack every MP that has stood in the way of BREXIT. If the Government doesn't sack the traitors then the British peoples trust in politics will be gone.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
